name: MidCap Financial
overview:
MidCap Financial is a commercial finance firm that focuses exclusively on providing debt solutions to middle market health care companies. We provide a broad array of products intended to finance the growth and manage the working capital of companies spanning the breadth of the healthcare industry.

Borrowers in the healthcare industry need a lender that understands their business and has the creativity and flexibility to provide financing solutions that integrate that understanding. At MidCap Financial, our years of experience and strong balance sheet make us the lender of choice for these companies.

And unlike other lenders that provide a single product, we offer real estate loans, leveraged loans, asset based loans and venture debt which means that we can solve your companyâ€™s financing needs, not just today but throughout its full growth trajectory.
